definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: The chairs are sheltered to ensure operation under the raining weather.
sentences.chinese: 缆车都设有遮雨棚，以确保在雨天照常运行。

sentences.english: They raised the price of a one way lift ticket from $24 to $26.
sentences.chinese: 他们把缆车单程票价从24美元涨到26美元。

sentences.english: Slippery after arriving by slope, can multiply telpher return slope top again.
sentences.chinese: 滑到坡底后即可乘缆车再次回到坡顶。

sentences.english: The cable car 's first run started at the top of a307- foot hill.
sentences.chinese: 缆车一开始是从307尺高的坡道上往下行驶。

sentences.english: The most wonderful part of the pavilion is the cable cars that run every seven minutes.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士馆最精彩的部分会是缆车，7分钟一班。

sentences.english: I also have a variety of placeables, from pianos to phonographs to cable cars.
sentences.chinese: 我有大量的可放置物品，从钢琴到留声机到缆车。

sentences.english: The lower terminus is only a five-minute walk from the Bank of China Building.
sentences.chinese: 缆车终点离中国银行大楼只有五分钟路程。

sentences.english: Gee, Boingo, I'm really sorry. Are you still running the cable car?
sentences.chinese: 呀，啵嘤，我真的很难过你还在开缆车吗。

sentences.english: The most special thing about the Switzerland Pavilion is its cable-car view.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士国家馆最特别的要数缆车观景。

sentences.english: We enjoyed scenery and greeted with other classmates when we on the funicular .
sentences.chinese: 在缆车上，我们欣赏了风景并和其他的同学打招呼。

sentences.english: Inspired by nature, the design of this cable wire lock is a mimicry of ivy.
sentences.chinese: 受自然的启发，这个线缆车锁是对常春藤的模仿设计。

sentences.english: Creekside Park cable cars (gondolas) passing the Emirates Towers at sunset.
sentences.chinese: 暮色中的河畔公园以及正经过阿联酋大厦的缆车。

sentences.english: Outside in the glare, the shadows were black. Jon queued for his place on the cable car.
sentences.chinese: 户外骄阳似火，但树荫很浓乔在排队等候登缆车。

sentences.english: The cable car into the Serfaus-Fiss-Ladis ski area is only a 5-minute walk away.
sentences.chinese: 步行穿越行人专用区5分钟即可抵达缆车山谷站。

sentences.english: Tourists ride the gondola at the hotel <The Venetian in Las Vegas.
sentences.chinese: 旅客乘坐缆车在旅店<威尼斯人在拉斯维加斯进行。

sentences.english: Jasper Tramway is Canada's longest cable car.
sentences.chinese: 贾斯珀缆车是加拿大最长的缆车。

definition: plank walkway constructed on the face of a cliff/(archaic) elevated passageway connecting the upper levels of adjacent towers
shuttle bus ferrying passengers between train stations on two different rail lines
